title: Everyday Chic & Poise: Living a simple, happy and serene life
description: Everyday Chic & Poise is for every single girl who is looking to elevate her everyday life. Everything from social media to body lotions is relevant to living your best life. If you are struggling with being optimistic daily, blocking toxic frenemies, dressing up daily and finding time for yourself, you need this book to help remind you that nobody is more important today than you are.
author: Chloe Martis
